product_name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Quick Trip Toiletry Organizer
long_description: The Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Quick Trip is an ultralight toiletry organizer. This small, duffel-style toiletry bag is just the right size for a quick trip up the coast or a weekend away. Includes 2 exterior zippered pockets in addition to the main compartment; main compartment has a large zippered opening. Ultra lightweight ripstop silnylon allows for visibility of contents; plus, it's water- and stain-resistant. Quick-grab handle for convenient carrying.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Quick Trip is an ultralight toiletry organizer. This small, duffel-style toiletry bag is just the right size for a quick trip up the coast or a weekend away.
